downloadTitle: Azure Managed Services Playbook for CSP Partners
downloadDescription: The Azure Managed Services Playbook is for all Microsoft partners in the Cloud Solution Provider (CSP) program looking to build a managed services business on Azure.
detailsSection: The Azure Managed Services Playbook is for all Microsoft partners in the Cloud Solution Provider (CSP) program looking to build a managed services business on Azure.  This book provides a framework for those looking to build a managed services practice, the opportunities to differentiate and the investments required in people, process and tools. The insights and best practices in the ebook are sourced from interviews with more than 50 Cloud MSPs.
